text: Takehito Koyasu (子安 武人 Koyasu Takehito) (born May 5, 1967) is a Japanese voice actor and singer. When he dubs hentai, he uses the pseudonym of Hayato Jumonji. He is the voices for Dio Brando in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure and Shigeru Aoba in Neon Genesis Evangelion. Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese voice actors
title: Takehito Koyasu
